mapper.insert: insert into TESPProcessionPhoto (PersonPhotoID, PersonID, PhotoFilePath, PhotoFileName, PhotoFileSuffix) values (#{personPhotoID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{personID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{photoFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoFileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select PersonPhotoID, PersonID, PhotoFilePath, PhotoFileName, PhotoFileSuffix from TESPProcessionPhoto
